entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:36 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon then 70 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:36 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:36 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
